ItemTooltips.phase_boots: Against high movement speed heroes and heavy  melees, prefer it over Power Treads
ItemTooltips.power_treads: Against blinking heroes and nukers prefer it over Phase.
ItemTooltips.force_staff: Forge Spirits -> Force Staff yourself -> Ice Wall -> Medallion -> Coldsnap. This is how you win a game before it really begins.
ItemTooltips.black_king_bar: When the enemy realizes your right click is decimating them, they will start to focus you. Time for BKB.
ItemTooltips.medallion_of_courage: You can solo Roshan with it and PT at level 10/
